definition: to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Most commonly used in deodorants to plug up your pores and to not allow you to sweat.
sentences.chinese: 大多用於除臭劑中，堵塞了毛孔並防止出汗。

sentences.english: Use underarm deodorant, and go easy with cologne.
sentences.chinese: 使用腋下除臭劑，少用些古龍香水。

sentences.english: It is a good skin toner and can be added to deodorants .
sentences.chinese: 它是很好的緊膚劑，並且也能添加入除臭劑中。

sentences.english: The market prospect of antiperspirants and deodorants in China are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 並對我國止汗除臭劑市場前景進行了分析。

sentences.english: But some people are actually allergic to deodorant.
sentences.chinese: 但實際上有些人對除臭劑過敏。

sentences.english: This kind of deodorizer can keep the fridge free of bad smells.
sentences.chinese: 此種除臭劑可防止冰箱出現臭味。

sentences.english: Use deodorant2 and brush your teeth or use mouthwash.
sentences.chinese: 使用除臭劑刷牙，或者用漱口水漱口。

sentences.english: Maybe he should go without deodorant?
sentences.chinese: 也許他應該不用除臭劑？

sentences.english: Objective To explore a method for determination of dissolvable zinc salt in deodorizing cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究除臭劑等化妝品中可溶性鋅鹽的測定方法。

sentences.english: Do you just slather on some extra deodorant as you head out the door?
sentences.chinese: 他們是否要在出門前塗抹大量除臭劑呢？

sentences.english: I will do less laundry and use more deodorant.
sentences.chinese: 新年裏，我要減少洗衣服的次數，多用除臭劑。

sentences.english: Another toiletry that westerners like to use is deodorant. Because we stink!
sentences.chinese: 另外一種西方人喜歡化妝品是除臭劑。

sentences.english: Stop using antiperspirants and switch to natural deodorants.
sentences.chinese: 停止使用止汗劑，轉向天然的除臭劑。

sentences.english: ClO2 is the worlds most powerful DEODORIZER.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化氯是世界上最強大的除臭劑。

sentences.english: We are terrorized into buying deodorants.
sentences.chinese: 我們被脅迫去買除臭劑。
我使用的是無香型走珠除臭劑。
